transportAdvice: Tampa has a limited public transit system including buses and a free downtown streetcar, but most tourist areas are spread out and best navigated by car or taxi. Walking is practical within specific districts like Ybor City and downtown, but a rental car or taxi is recommended for broader exploration.

weather.description: Mild and pleasant winter weather with cool nights and comfortable sunny days.
Dry and mild with warm afternoons and refreshingly cool evenings.
Spring begins with warming temperatures and mostly sunny skies.
Warm and dry with low humidity, one of the most pleasant months to visit.
Heat and humidity begin to build with occasional afternoon thunderstorms.
Hot and humid with frequent afternoon thunderstorms marking the start of rainy season.
Peak summer heat with near-daily afternoon thunderstorms and high humidity.
Similar to July with intense heat, high humidity, and frequent heavy downpours.
Still hot and stormy with the highest hurricane risk of the season.
Temperatures begin to ease and rain becomes less frequent as the dry season approaches.
Comfortable and dry with warm days and cooler evenings returning.
Mild winter conditions with low humidity and pleasant sunny days ideal for sightseeing.
